author: Special Correspondent
text: The Japan Foundation and the C. P Ramaswami Aiyar Foundation is jointly holding an exhibition on the works of Benoy K. Behl, a documentary filmmaker and photographer, on ‘Hindu Deities Worshipped in Japan’. The expo will be inaugurated at the C. P Ramaswami Aiyar Foundation at 10:30 am, today.
title: Art exhibition
